pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
CJ4 Bezel Overlay for the standby flight instrument. See here for contact info and notes: http://simstrumentation.com
There is a user prop to change how the display over dims. By default it dims with SIMSTRUMENTATION Ambient Light Dimmer, but you may also choose the PFD1 dimmer value, or always bright.
Ambient back lighting is only supported while using the SIMSTRUMENTATON Ambient Light Dimmer control.
